name: Strixhaven Comprehensive
theme: Colleges of Strixhaven (Lorehold, Prismari, Quandrix, Silverquill, Witherbloom). Focus on spells, 'magecraft', 'learn/lesson', wards, tokens (Pest/Inkling/Fractal/Elemental/Spirit), counters and copying.
notes: This package emphasizes Instants and Sorceries plus creatures that care about them.
Includes Learn and Lesson patterns; reminder text omitted or paraphrased to keep templates compact.
Ward appears on creatures and permanents with variable cost expressions.
Fractals use +1/+1 counters; Inklings fly; Pests refund life when they die; Elementals skew Prismari; Spirits skew Lorehold.
Modal DFCs are not emitted because the app does not model double-faced cards.

Lorehold_RW: Reanimate or recur small creatures; reward sacrificing or exiling your own graveyard; Spirits and historic vibes.
Token: 3/2 red and white Spirit with haste.
Prismari_UR: Big spells, copying, impulse draw, Elemental tokens, treasure-like ramp for spells.
Quandrix_UG: Mathy counters, Fractal tokens, ramp tied to spells, card draw and tempo.
Silverquill_WB: Pumping your team, flying Inklings, discard and targeted buffs/debuffs, words-as-weapons flavor.
Witherbloom_BG: Life drain and gain, Pests, sacrifice, graveyard value.

notes: Cards with Learn appear across all colors via Instant/Sorcery and ETB on some creatures.
Lessons are represented by generic Sorcery templates; the system does not force the 'Lesson' subtype, but these are tuned to feel like Lessons.
